channel.title: Noob question, compiling
channel.description:
@echo off @echo Compiling... title Compiler "C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.8.0_25/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -
sourcepath src src/org/arios/*.java pause
This jdk is my correct version I changed it already...
I am on widnows 8.1 still getting cannot find system pat

item.title: Noob question, compiling
item.dc:creator: @Coldmedicine Coldmedicine
item.description:
@Coldmedicine wrote:

[quote=“MikeMike1997, post:2, topic:549227”]Try adding “C:/Program Files (x86)/Java/jdk1.8.0_25/bin/javac.exe” -d bin -cp lib/*; -"

And see what happens?[/quote]

Read full topic

"C:/Program Files/Java/jdk1.8.0_25/bin/javac.exe" -d bin -cp lib/*; -

sourcepath src src/org/arios/*.java
pause

I am on widnows 8.1 still getting cannot find system pat
